Mare clausum: or A ransack for the Dutch May 23. 1666. By E.S. Gent. Licensed, May 30. 1666. Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
8 p.
printed by Peter Lillicrap, for John Million, at the Man in the Moon in the Little Old Baly, London : 1666.
In verse. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
